org.fun.game.tetris

Enum Tetrion.Mode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Tetrion.Mode>
      • org.fun.game.tetris.Tetrion.Mode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Tetrion.Mode>
    Enclosing class:
    Tetrion

    public static enum Tetrion.Mode
extends java.lang.Enum<Tetrion.Mode>
    Class to store standard configurations for the Tetris game.
    Author:
    Mathieu Brunot

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      CLASSIC
      Classic Tetris rules.
      MIX
      A mix between CLASSIC rules and MODERN rules.
      MODERN
      Modern Tetris rule.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getLevelUpSpeedUpRatio()
      Ratio applied to Tetrion.gravity on each Tetrion.level up.
      long getLockDelay()
      Lock delay refers to how many frames a Tetromino waits while on the ground before locking.
      boolean isFloorKickEnabled()
      Are floor kicks enabled?
      boolean isInfiniteLockDelayEnabled()
      Is infinity mode enabled?
      boolean isWallKickEnabled()
      Are wall kicks enabled?
